perfcenter.simulator.metric

Class _DiscreteSampleAverageMetricSingleSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • perfcenter.simulator.metric._MetricSimSlotLevel
      • perfcenter.simulator.metric._DiscreteSampleAverageMetricSingleSlot

  •  class _DiscreteSampleAverageMetricSingleSlot
extends _MetricSimSlotLevel
    This class contains the server level bifurcation of values.

    _total is the dummy server used to verify the totals across the servers. _passthrough is the dummy server used to store values for samples not coming from any request context.

    Author:
    nadeesh
